metadata.Title: CVE-2022-32742 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in Samba. Some SMB1 write requests were not correctlyrange-checked to ensure the client had sent enough data to fulfill thewrite, allowing server memory contents to be written into the file (orprinter) instead of client-supplied data. The client cannot control thearea of the server memory written to the file (or printer).

criterions.comment: samba: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
